name: MAKE\_MODE
intent: Construct a Mode (atomic semantic excitation) with a given label (e.g. frequency, polarization).
psi\_action: ψ uses Mode to determine oscillation pattern.
chi\_action: STEPχ(m, χ) updates the phase/amplitude of Mode m according to ψ- and λ-coupled χ-dynamics.
omega\_action: Ω(m) normalizes Mode m (e.g. unit norm) within its host Box, ensuring compatibility with Box-level Ω-invariants.
